Title: Laxmi N. - Book Layout Design, eBook Design: ePub/Kindle, KDP, IngramSpark Expert - Upwork Freelancer from Chennai, India
Description:
Looking to publish your book? Are you looking for the most experienced people to assist you with the publishing process? You have come to the right place.

At AtriTeX, we assist authors and publishers to get their books ready for publishing. We take your manuscripts and perform Print Layout Design using InDesign and provide Print-ready PDF files ready for submitting to POD portals like KDP, Lulu and IngramSpark.

We also prepare your manuscripts for publishing eBooks on KDP, Apple Books, Kobo, Barnes and Nobles Nook, and Google Play. We will provide the reflowing and fixed layout ePUB files for submission to these portals. We also provide the ePUB/KF8/KPF formats for publishing on Amazon's KDP for the Kindle.

We are eBook experts who take pride in our work. Every task we do, we do it in such a way that we can showcase it. Our expertise is in ePUB, KPF, KF8, Fixed Layout ePub, Read-aloud ePub and iBooks Author books apart from Mobi, Microsoft Lit, Palm and other legacy formats.

For print publishing, we offer end-to-end typesetting services creating beautiful PDF files ready for printing and POD on Amazon's KDP.

Apart from the above, we also customize PDF deliverables for BookBaby, Nook, Lulu, IngramSpark (LSI), DiggyPod, Draft2Digital, and Publishdrive.

The people on our team have worked on projects from Elsevier, Springer, Wiley, Cengage, McGraw-Hill etc. to name a few. We have extensive knowledge and experience spanning two decades in the publishing services field.

Some of our offerings are:

  Ebook  conversions (ePUB, KPF and KF8 for Kindle (KDP), ePUB files for
  iPAD/iPhone), ePUB files for B&N Nook, Kobo, Sony, etc.
  Typesetting/Formatting/Page Layout
  POD file preparation for KDP, IngramSpark, B&N, Lulu etc.

Title: Joey R. - SEO - Websites - TLC - Upwork Freelancer from St. Pete Beach, United States
Description:
I ONLY work with growing businesses and startups, specializing in the TLC they require.

I first learned SEO as it was being invented as I was living in Silicon Valley at that time. Next, I learned website design and development. My specialization is helping businesses grow on Google. See more at Wizerd.com

A quick summary about me ...

I was born and raised in Kansas, traveled and lived abroad for a couple of years after college, spent ten years in California during the startup boom, and moved to St Petersburg Florida to launch Wizerd. My mission is to specialize in serving growing businesses at an affordable price. I also understand the TLC startups and business owners require and this is part of everything I do.

A longer back story ... I come from generations of small business owners. My great-grandfather, grandfather, grandmother, and parents were all small business owners. I started my first business at age 16 and never looked back. 

For ten years, I lived in Southern and Northern California, working on startups, SEO, and new technologies. I loved the rush and thrill of new inventions, but something was always missing. And most big tech companies eventually hurt smaller businesses, which goes against my core.

So … I had an idea. Leave California, settle in a smaller “community-focused” city, get back to my roots, and start a business specializing in helping growing businesses. In 2019 I found St Petersburg FL and fell in love … then created Wizerd to fight for the little guys and bring back happiness to business owners.

Title: Emmanuel K. - Creative eBook Ghostwriter to transform your idea into Bestseller Book - Upwork Freelancer from Lagos Island, Nigeria
Description:
__ every day, every month, so many clients ask me questions like:

• Can you walk me through the ghostwriting process?

• What is your process for maintaining my voice and vision in the book?

• Can you help me develop my ideas if I’m starting from scratch?

• I’ve written my first draft, but I’m not confident. Can you review it and offer expert insights?

• Do I retain full ownership of the book once it’s finished?

• Based on your experience, what should I know before getting started?

• Can you handle projects outside of books, like blogs, articles, or website content?

So here’s the bottom line: I’ve got the answers, the experience, and the skills to handle all your ghostwriting needs.

Now, let me walk you through some of these common questions I get from clients like you.

When it comes to ghostwriting, the process is seamless and collaborative. I start by understanding your vision, goals, and ideas. Then, we build an outline together, followed by drafts that I refine based on your feedback until you’re thrilled with the result.

Maintaining your voice and vision is my priority. I’ll spend time getting to know your style, tone, and purpose of the book through interviews and notes. It’ll feel like you wrote every word yourself.

If you’re starting from scratch, no worries—I can help you develop your ideas into something amazing. Whether it’s brainstorming themes, structuring the flow, or diving into research, I’ve got you covered.

For those with a first draft, I can definitely review it, polish it, and offer expert insights to bring out its full potential.

Yes, once the project is complete, you retain full ownership of the book. It’s 100% your work—I’m just the hands helping you bring it to life.

From my experience, one thing you should know before we start is that clear communication and trust make the process smoother and more enjoyable for both of us.

And yes, I handle projects beyond books, like blogs, articles, and website content. If it’s writing, I can make it happen.

I’m here to bring creativity, passion, and expertise to your project. Let’s take the next step together!

===================================
© Emmanuel K

Description:
**Profile Description: Digital Marketing Expert | Ads | Email Marketing | SEO**

As a **Digital Marketing expert**, I specialize in developing and executing comprehensive strategies that drive measurable results across **Ads**, **Email Marketing**, and **Search Engine Optimization (SEO)**. My focus is on helping businesses grow by increasing online visibility, attracting quality leads, and converting them into loyal customers.

### Digital Advertising Expert
Running successful ad campaigns requires a keen understanding of platforms and audience targeting. I manage effective **Google Ads**, **Facebook Ads**, and **social media ad campaigns** that deliver high ROI. My approach includes:
- **Targeted Ad Creation:** Crafting compelling ad copy and creatives that capture the attention of your audience.
- **Smart Budgeting & Optimization:** Implementing smart bidding strategies to ensure maximum return on ad spend.
- **Campaign Monitoring & Adjustment:** Continuously analyzing performance metrics to optimize campaigns and maximize results.

With a strong emphasis on performance-driven campaigns, I ensure your paid ads generate the right leads and conversions at the best cost.

### Email Marketing for Engagement & Retention
Email marketing is one of the most effective ways to nurture leads and engage with your audience. My expertise in **email automation** and **list segmentation** ensures that every email is relevant, timely, and personalized for better engagement. Here’s how I can help:
- **Automated Email Sequences:** Creating automated drip campaigns to nurture leads through every stage of the sales funnel.
- **Data-Driven Personalization:** Tailoring messages based on user behavior and segmentation for higher open and click-through rates.
- **A/B Testing & Optimization:** Continuously refining email campaigns to improve engagement and drive conversions.

I build email strategies that not only increase customer retention but also contribute significantly to long-term revenue growth.

### SEO for Higher Visibility & Organic Traffic
Getting your website to rank on the first page of Google is critical for long-term success. I have a proven track record of improving **organic rankings** and driving **quality traffic** through strategic SEO practices, including:
- **Keyword Research & Optimization:** Identifying and targeting the right keywords that align with your business goals.
- **Technical SEO:** Enhancing website performance, from page speed to mobile optimization, ensuring search engines can easily crawl your site.

I have extensive experience guiding high-net-worth individuals and businesses through the intricacies of the tax system. My expertise encompasses a wide range of tax services, including the preparation of complex tax returns for Partnerships (Form 1065), S-Corporations (Form 1120-S), and Personal Income Tax Returns (Form 1040). I also specialize in state and local tax obligations, such as Sales & Use Tax, Commercial Activity Tax, Franchise Tax, and Business & Occupation Tax, ensuring you meet all your tax obligations at every level.

I understand that unforeseen tax issues can arise. That's why I offer comprehensive solutions beyond tax preparation, including assistance with resolving notices from the IRS, state, and local tax authorities. My goal is to minimize penalties and interest while navigating the intricacies of the resolution process to achieve the most favorable outcome for you. 

Furthermore, I provide comprehensive bookkeeping services, empowering you with valuable financial insights. By working together, we can analyze your financial performance in detail, enabling you to make informed business decisions that drive growth and achieve your financial objectives

One of my greatest rewards is assisting entrepreneurs in bringing their business dreams to fruition. I guide them through the process of business formation, ensuring they choose the most advantageous legal structure and establish sound financial and tax reporting systems from the outset. This proactive approach helps to prevent future tax problems and sets a strong foundation for long-term success.

I believe in building long-term relationships with my clients, founded on trust and open communication. By partnering with me, you'll gain a trusted CPA committed to providing personalized service and unwavering support as we work together towards your financial goals. I'm excited for our initial call to discuss your specific needs and explore how my expertise can be applied in a beneficial manner.

Title: Bonface O. - PhD-Level Thesis Editor, Writer, Proofreader and Formatting Expert. - Upwork Freelancer from Toms River, United States
Description:
Hello, my name is Bonface, and today I will be your academic editor and research writing strategist. With my 10+ years of experience in academic editing and proofreading, I uniquely specialize in transforming complex academic work into polished publication-ready documents for researchers, institutions, and those looking forward to publishing their work. I have extensive experience in copyediting, dissertation formatting, journal manuscript preparation, and grant writing. My work is unique and professional because I go beyond ensuring clarity and compliance to establishing the desired scholarly impact, achieving the ultimate goals, and meeting reasonable objectives.
In my decade-long practice, I have learned, unlearned, and relearned that being SMART beats all odds.

In my SMART-based model, I have known that effective partnership with clients to elevate their work from draft to distinction requires utmost commitment, be it a thesis defense preparation, publication of peer-reviewed articles, or writing an NIH-compliant proposal. We both need to be Specific in our intentions, Measurable in our practice/outcome, Achievable in our goals and objectives, Realistic in our scope, and Time-bound in our delivery and turnaround.

WHAT WILL I DELIVER WHEN YOU HIRE ME?

100% error-free manuscripts (Grammar, syntax, style, formatting) tailored to APA, MLA, Chicago, AMA, Turabian, and Harvard guidelines.

Boosted Journal acceptance rates: This is achieved through extensive pre-submission peer-review simulations and impact-focused revisions.

Dissertation/Thesis Rescue: This is for both graduate and undergraduate students looking for structure optimization, identifying and refining literature review gaps, and enhanced research data presentation and clarity.

Grant Proposal Success: This is achieved through persuasive writing, ensuring compliance checks, and aligning your proposal with the criteria and guidelines provided by the funding body. My proposals align with the NIH, NSF, and ERC criteria.

WHICH FIELDS DO I SERVE?

STEM (Medicine, Engineering)
Social Sciences
Humanities
Business
Law.

WHAT ARE MY CORE COMPETENCIES?

ACADEMIC WRITING AND RESEARCH.
• Dissertations/Theses.
 Chapter structuring/automation of table of contents.
 Hypothesis framing.
 Methodology justification.
 Results interpretation.
 Data analysis, interpretation, and presentation.
 References and citations management (APA 7th edition, AMA, MLA, Chicago, Harvard, Turabian)

• Literature Reviews.
 Systematic reviews
 Scoping reviews
 Critical synthesis
 Gap identification
 Citation management (EndNote, Zotero, Mendeley).

• Journal Manuscripts.
 IMRaD formatting
 Abstract optimization
 Keyword strategy for discoverability.

• Grant Proposals.
 Specific aims
 Significance/innovation sections
 Budget justifications
 Boilerplate elimination.

2. COPYEDITING.

• Style Guide Mastery
 APA 7th
 Chicago 17th
 IEEE
 AMA
 Journal-specific requirements (e.g., Nature, Elsevier)
• Ensuring Clarity and Flow:
 Simplifying jargon
 Fixing nominalizations
 Ensuring effective progression of logical arguments.
• Strengthening Technical Precision:
 Aligning and numbering equations.
 Automating and captioning tables, figures and all statistical annotations from SPSS, R, and Python outputs.
 Checking Plagiarism and Detecting AI content: This is achieved through Turnitin Instructor, iThenticate-reviewed revisions, and ensuring proper paraphrasing and sourcing.

3. PROOFREADING:
• Grammar/spelling
 Advanced proficiency with US/UK variants.
• Consistency
 Abbreviations
 Acronyms
 Numbering
 Headings.
 Terminology.
• Formatting
 Margins
 Fonts
 Citations
 References
 Submission-ready PDFs.
• Sensitivity Reads
 Inclusive language adjustments for gender, ethnicity, and cultural context.

4. SPECIALIZED SERVICES
Peer Review Response Letters: Rebuttal drafting and revision tracking.
Conference Posters/Presentations: Visual clarity and narrative focus.
Book Editing: Academic monographs and edited volumes (indexing, cross-referencing).

WHY CHOOSE ME?

Academic Credentials: Advanced degree (Master’s/PhD) in [Your Field] with firsthand research experience.
Speed & Accuracy: 24–72-hour turnaround for proofreading; 98% client satisfaction rate.
Toolkit: AI-enhanced editing (Grammarly Premium, ProWritingAid) + human expertise for nuance.
Confidentiality: NDAs, secure file transfer, and plagiarism-free guarantees.

LET’S ELEVATE YOUR ACADEMIC WORK

If you’re racing toward a submission deadline, battling reviewer critiques, or struggling to articulate complex ideas, I’ll ensure your work meets the highest scholarly standards.

NEXT STEPS:

Share Your Document: Send your draft, style guide, and target journal/publisher guidelines.
Free Sample Edit: I’ll proofread 2 pages at no cost to demonstrate my approach.
Collaborative Revision: Receive tracked changes, a summary report, and a post-edit Q&A session.
